title: Defi Loans, NFTs and On-Network ID
description: 2020年には、個人ローンの負債額が1620億ドルに達しました。暗号を使って実行されたものはほとんどありませんでした。それを変えていきましょう。

f6_assessments.q0: From the perspective that the proposer plans to use NFTs to store the consumer data addresses the challenge, however it is opening wide range of legal topics which aren't part of the challenge.
f6_assessments.q1: Work packages are listed on a very top level, unfortunately the developers and project member background is not given. Considering the amount requested I would propose to improve the details related to development.
f6_assessments.q2: Milestones are clearly defined. work packages related to those topics are auditable. Risks towards the legal part and how the whole project would be applied in different countries needs some more elaboration.

f6_assessments.q0:
The problem presented a problem and offered a solution to address the problem but the problem statement seem to state a metric without specifics or references.
for example "In 2020 personal loan debt topped $162 billion. Very little if any at all was executed using crypto. "  which raises so many questions of the specifics such as "Is this a global debt data or it is specific to a particular continent?", "How was the figure arrived(provide references)".
The proposed solution will need more details to better explain how it will be achieved , potential pitfalls, cost implications , timelines and milestones .
I strongly disagree.
f6_assessments.q1:
Verifiable experience wasn't presented with links and the implementation plan will need to be more detailed. probably break it down to smaller sub-headers.
No cost breakdown on how the requested funds will be utilised to achieve success considering the requested amount of $200000.
i Strongly disagree.
f6_assessments.q2:
The proposal did not provide sufficient information the help to audit its progress and success.
I strongly disagree.

f6_assessments.q0: Using NFTs to loans addresses the challenge brief of creating business models with NFT's at the core. Loans denoted as NFT's will increase the use and number of NFTs on Cardano, thus increasing utility and providing value to the ecosystem. I would like the team to expand on the architecture behind the loans, how will it function? I advise the team to have a look at Liqwid Finance, Liqwid is a protocol offering loans through a decentralized protocol, the team might be able to collaborate with liqwid.
f6_assessments.q1: I like the idea but the proposal requires further development to ensure successful implementation. I would want to see links to LinkedIn or similar to provide additional detail/evidence about the team's work history, education and past experiences. The team can expand on the type and number of team members required to implement the proposal. I advise the team to develop a risk assessment considering the challenges and risks relevant to a successful implementation, the team needs to think: "what needs to be true for this project to succeed". I would like the team to expand on the plan to go to market and acquire customers.
f6_assessments.q2: The team provided a timeline with a budget. I would like to see the team further develop and define Key Performance Indicators (KPI's) for the project – example "Issue 5 loans by month 2, or sign up 1000 customers by month x, etc"– set measurables for performance and use it as a KPI, then connect the KPI to the milestones on the project roadmap. I would like to see the budget broken down into monthly spending and I would like the team to connect the KPI's and roadmap milestones to the spending. By connecting the KPI's and roadmap milestones to the budget, you can track performance and spending over a timeline . As the project stand at the moment, I feel the project will be difficult to audit.

f6_assessments.q0: Ths is a massive problem in all the economies in all the countries and a solution around this problem would bring a lot of volume to the Cardano ecosystem.  A complex problematic like that would need a lot of brain power and, unfortunately, information on the details of the solution proposed are scarce.  The information provided for the proposal is not sufficient for have an idea of the solution's structure.  Maybe, it's a work-in-process. And I don't blame them.
f6_assessments.q1:
-	The proposer mention relevant skills and experience but not provide references or links for check that information.  The proposal does not provided specific details about the team in charge of the implementation.

-	 The proposer provides a budget but not a budget clearly outline and broken down into identifiable items.

-	The proposer does not provide a sensible and conductible plan for implementation that shows not only what is being done but also how.

-	The plan does not describe the resources necessary to implement the proposal. 

-	The proposal does not clearly explain technical aspects like architecture, languages or tecnologies crucial for implementation.

-	The proposer has not considered challenges and risks relevant to a successful implementation.
f6_assessments.q2:
-	The proposal does not provided a roadmap with detailed milestones for the follow-up of the proposal.

-	The proposal does not present clear metrics/KPIs  that define the success of the proposal or some means of monitoring the proposal.  The community will not be able to audit the progress of the proposal.

solution: 消費者が消費者のためにカスタムローンを作成し、資金を提供できるようなシステムを開発します。
experience: 金融サービス業界で9年間の経験を持ち、最近では法務オペレーションのディレクターを務めました。
